replies.bodyText: ok,i got it and i'll remove it
replies.author: zhuxiaoshang

timeline.bodyText:
Can you add a case for this?
You can create a Catalog extends GenericInMemoryCatalog and implement open to throw exception. The check the TableEnv should not contains this catalog.
timeline.author: JingsongLi

replies.bodyText: thanks for your suggestions.i'll add a test case.
replies.author: zhuxiaoshang
